korean: 넷플릭스, 음악 스트리밍, 클라우드까지 합치니 꽤 나가더라.
작은 금액이지만 모이면 부담이 되는 것 같다.
english: I calculated the fees for the services I'm subscribed to.
Adding up Netflix, music streaming, and cloud storage, it's quite a lot.
I thought I should cancel the ones I don't use.
Small amounts add up and become burdensome.
